before.header: Call us to get your State Pension
before.h1: Call us to get your State Pension
before.p1: According to the information you have given us, you reached State Pension age before 6 April 2016. This service is only for people who reach their State Pension age on or after 6 April 2016.

p2.overseas: Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm UK time

before.p3: You will need your National Insurance number.

early.header: You are too early to get your State Pension
early.h1: You are too early to get your State Pension
early.p1: According to the information you have given us, you are too early to get your State Pension.
early.p2: You can claim your State Pension four months before you reach State Pension age.
early.p2-part2: You will reach State Pension age on

p3.overseas: Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm UK time
